The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 February is 3,390,350 (6,023.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 January, there were 151,445 new confirmed cases (269.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 January, there were 218,197 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 31% (66,752 fewer cases).
